metadata.title: CVE-2018-21008 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.16.7. A use-after-freecan be caused by the function rsi_mac80211_detach in the filedrivers/net/wireless/rsi/rsi_91x_mac80211.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21008` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-166-generic - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-lowlatency - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-166-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-166-generic - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-166-lowlatency - 4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1056-aws - 4.4.0-1056.60
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1061-azure - 4.15.0-1061.66~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-166.195~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1056.60').
linux-azure package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1061.66~14.04.1').
